title: Ekko, Believe The Hype
body:
First and Foremost Riot, Thank you. I can't remember really the last time I had so much hype to play a new champion (I'm sure I am not alone on this). No matter what you do in game as Ekko it is fun. If you are stomping, or about to lose I honestly couldn't really say anything negative about the people in game, or on my team (even when I thought that I myself was doing terribly). Along with a great comic, KILLER LOGIN music, and a awe inspiring reveal trailer I can honestly say it lived up to the hype. 


Thank You Riot for creating such an amazing champion.

replies.body: He is a fun champion, but he is so OP and broken on release that he will get major nerfs and rework and end up not living up to the hype at all.
